timeline.bodyText: Question - should we just use the value of user.skinId as the token id instead of adding another claim on the token?  I think that might be best - less moving parts.  When a user logs in, they get a user token with the id out of their user.skinId.  If that gets invalidated/updated, then all tokens using that would be invalidated, right?
